name: kotlin-tooling-extensions
description: Kotlin extensions for VSCode: detekt and ktlint

scripts.compile: npm run compile --prefix extensions/detekt && npm run compile --prefix extensions/ktlint
scripts.watch: npm run watch --prefix extensions/detekt & npm run watch --prefix extensions/ktlint
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix extensions/detekt && npm run lint --prefix extensions/ktlint
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix extensions/detekt && npm run test --prefix extensions/ktlint
scripts.test:watch: npm run test:watch --prefix extensions/detekt & npm run test:watch --prefix extensions/ktlint
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage --prefix extensions/detekt && npm run test:coverage --prefix extensions/ktlint
